texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.LeaveRequest:InValidDate: Invalid date time, check the starting date that is not in the past for now or greater than the ending one
texts.LeaveRequest:NotFound: Approved Request can not be updated, let create a new one
texts.LeaveRequest:ApproveError: Can not approve a request that has been rejected
